Summary: UfO sighted behind house in field off RT.9 between 95 and RT.17 Myrtle Beach.
trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Myrtle Beach
There were no other sightings in Myrtle Beach on or around July 17th 2000
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was night time and my girlfriend and I were traveling from turnpike(95) on rt. 9 towards my mothers house just north of Myrtle Beach, SC. We both saw around object with red, blue, white, etc. lights going around object. It then lifted up and zoomed west without a sound. I didn't stop to investigate but know what I saw was not public technology. I have told friends up to this point but figured it is time to record the incident. Not first time seeing other worldly crafts either. Ben
